definition: variant of 金櫃|金柜[jin1 gui4]
surname Jin/surname Kim (Korean)/Jurchen Jin dynasty (1115-1234)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
surname Kui
variant of 櫃|柜[gui4]
to lack/lacking/empty/exhausted
variant of 金櫃石室|金柜石室[jin1 gui4 shi2 shi4]

sentences.english: The paper probes the treatment methods for cough with dyspnea discussed in Synopsis of Golden Chamber.
sentences.chinese: 对《金匮要略》所论咳喘治法进行了探讨。

sentences.english: The"seventeen sentence"in JinGui YaoLue is guidance on how to treat the deficiency syndrome of the liver.
sentences.chinese: 《金匮要略》“十七句”是肝虚证的具体治疗方法。

sentences.english: "Golden Chamber" and "Autumn is not fresh lung, " said.
sentences.chinese: 《金匮要略》又有“秋不食肺”之说。

sentences.english: The results are all positive, proving that jinguihuishengyi has the anti-fatigue function.
sentences.chinese: 结果均为阳性，证明金匮回生液具有抗疲劳的功效。

sentences.english: Synopsis of the Golden Chamber is the oldest monograph on Febrile and Miscellaneous Disease in China .
sentences.chinese: 《金匮要略》是我国现存最早的一部诊治杂病的专著。

sentences.english: Laws in treatment of emotional diseases expounded in the Golden Chamber from science of TCM formula.
sentences.chinese: 从方剂学角度探讨《金匮要略》治疗情志疾病规律。

sentences.english: The second part discusses the theory origins of Pulmonary asthenia in the SPGC.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分探讨了《金匮要略》肺痿病的理论渊源。
